inn1.comm: Remember how Gambhir got out in the previous match? It was to a similar delivery except that that one was fuller, swung in towards off and middle and he tried to drive that hard, got a thick inside edge for a single
bowls that one full on the off and it's defended back towards the bowler, outswing again
goodish length outside off, nips away after pitching, he fishes for it and is beaten
goodish length outside off, guides that one through point into the deep for a couple of runs
drops that one short outside leg stump and he gets out of the way
in the channel outside off stump and he shoulders arms to let that one go
short of a good length on the off, chops that one down towards third man for a single
on a good length outside off stump, nipping away and he lets that one go
short of a length outside off, goes for the cut, misses, moved away a bit and was tempted into playing the cut, missed
short and wide and that's been cut away to third man for a single
bowled that one in the channel outside off, leaves that one alone
bowls that one short outside off, guides it to third man for a single
sliding down the leg side, tries to clip that one fine but misses, called a wide
goodish length on the off, rocks forward and drops it towards point
bowled on a good length on the off, pushes that one in front of mid-off for a single
short of a good length on middle, gets right behind that and defends it towards cover
banged in short on middle, that's been pulled towards fine leg for a single, nicely done, kept it down
ooh, inswinging yorker, pitched up on middle but this time Gambhir doesn't want to drive, he defends it into the leg side
pitched up again, pushes that firmly towards mid-off from the crease
good length outside off, gets on the back foot and pushes it to cover
slides that one down the leg side, called a wide and a fumble from the keeper allows a single
found the gap there, short of a good length, punched through point and cover for three runs, nicely timed
a touch too wide outside off stump, moving away, he leaves that one alone
bowled that on a good length, reaches forward and shoulders arms to that one
in the channel outside off stump again, shortish, left alone to the keeper
bowled on a length, pushes that firmly off the front foot towards mid-off
lovely drive from Rahane, some swing for Perera, that was pitched up and he leant forward to cream it through cover and point for a boundary
lands on a good length outside off, pushes that firmly towards extra cover
lands on a good length, drops that one towards point and sets off for a single
slower one bowled on middle and leg, defends it wide of mid-on for a single, spotted it
an attempted inswinging yorker again, lands as a full toss, pushes that one straight to mid-on
drops that short on middle, rocks back and pulls it away through square leg for a boundary, that's 5000 runs for him in ODIs
sliding on the pads, poor ball from Malinga, misdirected, a full toss on leg stump and that's been clipped away through midwicket for four runs

Rahane has been given out lbw, this one nipped back in, did he get an inside edge? Landed on the off stump and moved back in, struck him on the pads, no inside edge, struck him in line and the umpire thought that was out. We just need to see if height was an issue, may not have been. Sri Lanka strike
short of a good length outside off, moves away and he lets that one go
nicely bowled, tempting driving length outside off, moves away and he leaves that one alone
short of a good length on the off, gets back and defends him wide of midwicket
in the channel outside off stump, leaves that one alone to the keeper
short of a length outside off, cracks it from the crease wide of point for a couple of runs, didn't time it all that well
short of a good length outside off, runs that one down to third man for a single
shortish outside off, chops that one down towards point from the crease
short of a good length outside off, tries to run that one down towards third man, it just moves away to beat the outside edge
shortish outside off, runs that one down towards third man for a single
uppishly played but past midwicket, short of a good length and he chips it just to the left of the midwicket fielder for a boundary
nicely timed this time, good wristwork, shortish on leg stump and that's been turned away through square leg for a boundary
short of a good length on middle, tapped away into the leg side wide of midwicket
shortish on the off stump, turned off the back foot towards square leg
chases a wide one, called a wide, tried to flay it through the covers but didn't connect
similar delivery, would have been a wide had he left it alone, got a thick outside edge as he chased it, down to third man
drops that one down into the leg side and completes a quick single
gets on the back foot and knocks it down into the leg side
shortish on the off, rocks on the back foot and defends on the pitch
short and wide, slashed hard, down towards third man for a single
bowled on a good length outside off, reaches forward and defends it in front of cover
shortish on the off, a bit of away movement, gets back and defends it into the leg side
Kohli misread the length there, came down the track, it was held back, he was trying to crash it over the covers, got a thick outside edge, went wide of second slip for a boundary
this one's superbly timed, just a punch through point and cover, gets a couple, raises the 50
pitched on a length outside off, driven straight to extra cover, dives to his left to save a few runs
short outside off and he tried to crash that through cover and point, got an inside edge and it landed in front of the keeper
short of a good length, drops that one in front of point
shortish outside off, kept a little low, went for the cut and missed
in the channel outside off stump and that's been left alone to the keeper
shortish outside off, guides that one towards third man for a single
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and turns it wide of midwicket for a single
Risky again from Kohli , got to the pitch there and drive it through cover but ended up slicing it uppishly past the diving point
beaten, a goodish length ball outside off and Kohli pokes at that one, tries to open the face, is beaten
gets forward to that one and pushes it back towards the bowler
angling in towards middle, gets forward and turns it wide of mid-on for a single
bowled on a good length on the off, that's been pushed back to the bowler
dispatched from Gambhir, pitched up and there's plenty of room, cracks that through extra cover and mid-off
on middle and leg, turned wide of midwicket for a single
rose up to Gambhir, tried to fend it away into the leg side, struck hard on the glove, a short sharp ball, was in a bit of pain for Gambhir
some width for Virat and that was bowled on a good length, moved back and crunched it through extra cover, lovely shot, superbly timed
pitched up outside off, digs that one out towards cover from the crease
drops that one short outside off, Virat sways out of the way to that one
swinging away and that had Kohli in a bit of trouble, he tried to turn the face there to that full delivery but it moved away to go past the outside edge
short of a length outside off, bowled at 137.7 kmph, tried to cut that past point, missed

struck on the pads, Gambhir shuffled across to work that square, that moved in towards him, would have gone down leg, or maybe not. Was there a bit of bat? Replays showed that would have clipped leg stump. Appeal for lbw turned down. My initial impression was it would have missed leg
nicely driven, bowled on a length on middle, got across and wristily drove it wide of mid-on for a single
lovely shot but straight to the fielder in the deep, eased through cover for a single
angling in towards the off stump, is nicely behind it and defends it into the off side
slightly short on middle, gets on the back foot and works it through square leg for a single
slightly short on middle, gets on the back foot and works it past midwicket for a single
shortish on the off, punched towards long-off for a single
short outside off, cracked it down towards long-on for a single
floating it on a good length on middle, reaches forward and defends it into the leg side
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and turns it to midwicket
pitched on a length on middle and leg, got front and across and drove it through midwicket for a couple more runs
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and taps it to the bowler

Trapped in front, Pradeep angled that in towards middle and leg, it moved in, Kohli likes to shuffle and more often than not he connects well, he missed it this time and was caught in front of middle and leg as he was trying to flick it into the leg side. The umpire checks for a no-ball, Pradeep's foot landed behind the line so Kohli has to go. Replays also show the ball would have clipped leg stump
short of a good length on the off, defends it towards cover from the crease
fired it in on a good length on middle and off, pushed it back to the bowler
turned off the front foot towards midwicket
beaten, nipped away a hint, poked at that one outside off and it went past the outside edge
short of a length outside off, cracks that one straight to point
short of a good length, came down the track to punch it into the off side, kept low and came back in, went through the gate
on the pads, worked away through midwicket into the deep for a single
Rohit gets on the back foot and turns it towards midwicket
short of a good length outside off, punched towards cover from the crease
easy pickings for Gambhir, short and wide, plenty of width for Gambhir and he cuts it hard past a diving point for a boundary, no chance for third man
pitched on a length outside off, cracks that hard through extra cover into the deep for a single
that should give him some confidence, a meaty delivery on the pads and he drives that well through midwicket for a boundary
presents the straight bat this time, on middle and leg, gets forward and across and pushes it past the bowler to mid-on
short of a good length on the off, drops that towards point, thinks of a single but it's not there as Gambhir says no

Rohit is bowled! Lovely ball from Pradeep, that late movement proving the batsman's undoing, angled in towards middle and then moved away it seemed after pitching, just when he tried closing the face there to play it towards midwicket, it moved away and knocked back off
bowled that one in the channel outside off, leaves that one alone to the keeper
shortish outside off, guides that wide of point into the deep for a single
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and punches it towards the bowler
Bowled on a good length on the off, pushed into the off side
Tiwary played that shot well in his brief innings in the previous ODI, fetched it from outside off and chipped it through midwicket for three runs
in the channel outside off stump, holds its line and he lets that one go
few more runs for Tiwary, got front and across and turned it past mid-on for a couple more
short of a good length on the off, defends it into the off side from the crease
quick single, short of a good length, drops that into the off side, gets an inside edge onto the pads actually, rushes through for a single after Gambhir calls
on a good length outside off, defended solidly in the direction of point
short of a good length, knocks it down in front of point and races through for a single

Mix-up, Tiwary tapped that into the off side, he set off, then Gambhir, Tiwary hesitated and so did Gambhir, eventually they decided on going for the single and Tiwary was the man running to the danger end, dives at the non-striker's end but would probably have been out had that hit. Actually no, he would have made it.
tossed up outside off, no turn there, gets outside off and tries to close the face, gets a leading edge that lands safely
turned away into the leg side for a single
slides on the pads, tries to tickle it fine, gets a single wide of short fine, came off the pads
pushed it full outside off, pushes that wide of cover for a quick single, it held its line, not sure if it was an attempted doosra
tossed up on the off, comes down the track and drives it back to the bowler
bowled that on a good length outside off, defended into the off side
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and knocks it into the leg side
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and defends it back towards the bowler
shuffled big time there and tickled that through to deep square leg for a single, raises the 100
short of a good length on middle, whips it towards deep square leg for a single

superb delivery and Tiwary's fortunate, dropped that short did Pradeep and Tiwary had few answers, played at that one, it took the glove and sailed over the keeper for a boundary, Pradeep's bowled with pace and bowled well today
tossed up outside off, drives it towards extra cover

more hesitation, but Gambhir reaches his half-century, pushed it towards point, after a bit of a mix-up he completed the single and got another one on the overthrow, the bowler wasn't standing behind the stumps there
straight ball on middle and it's played back to the bowler
shortish on leg stump, turns that one really fine for a couple of runs
floating it on the off, rocks forward and plays it towards extra cover
tight line on the off stump and that's been defended to point
tossed up outside off and it's been driven back to the bowler
tossed up again, drives it down towards long-off for a single
flighted on off and middle, Gambhir comes down the track and digs it out back to the bowler
short of a good length outside off, cuts that behind point for a couple of runs
gets forward, gets to the pitch and drives it down to long-on for a single
flighted on middle, gets forward and pushes it towards extra cover
shortish on middle, punched through midwicket off the back foot for a single
no turn there, shortish on the off, dabbed it towards point for a single, a direct hit at the striker's end, stifled appeal but he was in
shortish on middle, punched off the back foot through extra cover for a single
on a good length on the off stump, defended into the off side
shortish on middle, punched towards long-on for a single
shortish outside off and he guided that one behind point smartly to earn a couple of runs
bowled that one flat outside off, gets across and plays it to midwicket
shortish outside off, chops that one behind point for a couple of runs
shortish outside off, makes a bit of room, the turn is minimal and he chops that behind point for one more
flighted outside off and it turns away, slower through the air this time and Tiwary played that too early, missed
gets forward and turns that away towards midwicket off the front foot
flighted outside off and it's driven through extra cover into the deep for a single
gets front and across and defends it towards midwicket
shortish on leg stump, turned away behind square for a single
floating it on middle, gets forward and plays it back to the bowler
stifled appeal for lbw, would have been going down leg, tries to clip it square, kisses the pads and fetches them three leg byes as it rolls down fine
floating it outside off, eased it through cover for an easy single
flighted on leg stump, tries to drive it through midwicket, is struck on the pads
Tiwary's moving along well here, short outside off, crunched through point for one more
doesn't turn, short and wide, tried to chop it behind point, missed
tossed up, comes down the track and drives it down to long-off for a single
flatter from Jeevan, short of a good length, punches it towards extra cover
tossed up, full toss on middle and it's driven down to long-on for a single
on the pads  and that's been driven away towards deep midwicket for a single
Gambhir steps down the track to the flighted delivery and drives it down to long-off for a single
Tiwary reverse-paddles that wide of short third for a couple of runs, pre-meditated, he had made up his mind about that
round the wicket, lands on leg stump, gets forward and turns it into the leg side
shortish on middle, punched off the back foot to midwicket
floated outside off, opens the face to play it wide of point for a single, raises the 50-stand, come at a good pace as well
short outside off, cuts it wide of deep point for a couple more
bowled that full on middle, tries to drive that inside out but then changes his mind and plays it straight back
pushed that one past cover for a single
shortish outside off, cracked it through towards deep cover for a single
tossed up on the off, drives that one to long-on for a single
shortish on middle, worked away off the back foot through square leg for a single
comes down the track, converts that into the full toss and drives it to long-on for a single
reverse-paddles that one behind point for an easy single
short outside off, moves away and cuts it behind deep point for two more runs, the fielder fumbled and that allowed them to complete the second without difficulty
turns away into the leg side off the back foot for a single
shortish on middle, worked through square leg for one more run
flighted on leg stump, drives that one down to long-on for a single
slow through the air, gets outside the line and turns it to square leg for a single
tossed up on middle, comes down the track and drives it wide of midwicket
short outside off, makes room and crunches that straight to extra cover
flat on leg stump, a bit of turn, played away through square leg for a single
well done Tiwary, a bit of air on that one, he made a bit of room and drove him handsomely over extra cover and bisected that gap between long-off and deep extra
tries to do it again but almost holed out, deep extra cover, Kapugedara is the man there, ran in but it landed just in front of him
gets on the back foot and turns it through midwicket for a single
short of a good length outside off, tried to guide that towards third man, missed
pitched up on the off, drove it through to deep cover for a single
good length on the off, gets across and pushes it down towards mid-on
short of a good length on the off, gets across and works it through midwicket for a single
driven on the up, hit hard into the ground and past the diving extra cover, a couple more runs for Gambhir
pitched on a length outside off, drives it straight to extra cover
short of a good length on the off, drops that into the off side towards point
short of a good length, gets forward and defends that soundly to extra cover
Tiwary attacks, the field is up for him and he seized the chance, pitched on a length, he charged down the track and drove it hard through extra cover and mid-off
gets on the back foot and drops it in front of mid-on for an easy single
short of a good length on the off, punches that towards mid-off
shortish on leg stump, that's been whipped through to deep square leg for a single
uppishly placed, put on a length and he sliced that towards point, got a run off the overthrow
on middle and leg and that's been turned through square leg for a single
tried to drive that through extra cover but got an inside edge onto the pads
shortish outside off, rolled his wrists over that one as he played it to backward point, Dilshan fielded it well, kept them to a single

appeal for a catch, that one nipped back in from outside off, was there an inside edge?  There was a sound, probably an inside edge but not given by the umpire. Tiwary was probably fortunate there, there seemed to be a faint inside edge as it moved back in
knocked away into the off side
shortish outside off, knocks it down in front of point for a single
short of a good length on the off, rocks on the back foot and taps it into the off side
a couple more for Tiwary, on the off stump, shuffles and turns it away past midwicket for two runs
ooh, tried to upper-cut that but that was a good, sharp, short ball, went past the bat
poor ball from the bowler, Tiwary reaches his half-century, a significant one for him, full toss on middle and leg and that's been whipped away through square leg
another quick single, tapped into the off side and he sets off
slower one bowled short outside off, drops that towards point
yorker, lands outside leg stump and Malinga lets out an ear-shattering scream, Tiwary wanted to flick that over square leg, missed, was struck on the pads
pushed that full outside off, squeezed it towards point for a single
full toss, Tiwary comes down the track and goes over the top, didn't connect well but cleared the in-field, two more over extra cover
good yorker, came down the track again and Malinga got that on target, Tiwary had to reach and dig that out for a single
pushed that one full on middle and off, played it towards mid-off for a quick single
short of a good length on the off, crunched towards deep point for a single, raises the 100-stand

appeal for a catch, short down the leg side, Tiwary tried to help that down to the fine-leg boundary, big appeal from Chandimal, there seemed to be a sound, Chandimal went up immediately, the umpire didn't think there was any contact, gave it a wide. Chandimal is stunned
tossed up, goes over the top, lofts that over mid-off for a boundary
short outside off, went for the cut but missed
flighted outside off, in the slot for Tiwary, smashes it over mid-off for a boundary, easily done
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and turns it to square leg for a single
gets back and pushes it into the off side

Tiwary has to go now, banged in short on middle and he had few answers, tried to fend it into the leg side, took his eyes off that delivery, a good bouncer, got it on the top of the bat and was comfortably caught at short third man

Raina goes first ball, Malinga is on a hat-trick, short of a good length outside off and he plays at that one, guides it straight to first slip, remember he was dropped at slip by Mahela in the fourth ODI
drops that one short on middle, gets on the back foot and knocks it down into the leg side, prevents the hat-trick
Dhoni's lucky now, dropped that short, Malinga bowled it short and Dhoni didn't have much to time react as he tried to pull, came off the helmet and sailed over the keeper, 200 up for India
Dhoni doesn't take too long to get going, pitched up outside off and it's driven well through extra cover for a boundary, nicely timed
that's been absolutely thrashed, full and wide and Dhoni reaches for that to cream that through the covers once again for a boundary

appeal for lbw, gets on the back foot and is rapped on the pads as he tries to whip it square, would have probably missed leg but we need to take a look, no turn, went flat, closer than it looked, would have clipped leg, marginal call
pushed away into the off side
shortish on the off, pulled through midwicket for a single
on middle and off, gets forward and knocks it wide of point for a single
finds the gap, cut that one past point for a couple of runs into the deep

Sri Lanka are hitting back, Gambhir falls, short outside off and a bit of away spin there, landed on the seam and spat away, good bounce there, appeared to turn it into the leg side but found Malinga stationed at point, came off the leading edge
on middle and leg, works that one behind short fine leg for a couple more runs
short of a good length on middle, pushed off the back foot through midwicket for a single
bowled on a length on middle and off, driven through midwicket for a couple of runs to get off the mark
lands on a good length, gets forward and drives that one back towards the bowler
shortish on leg stump, whipped through square leg into the deep for a single
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and turns it to midwicket
tossed up outside off, drives that one down towards long-off for a single
gets an inside edge onto the pads, pitched slightly short on middle
appeared to be the doosra, short outside off, cut that one wide of point for a couple of runs
floating it on a length on middle, drives it straight back to the bowler
reaches forward and drives it back, landed just short of the bowler
tries to turn the face there, lands on leg stump and spins a little further down, hit on the pads
turned into the leg side for a single
short and wide and that's been punished, slashes it through point for a boundary
shortish on middle, turned away through square leg for a single
Pathan's going well, short on middle and off and that's been pulled to deep square leg for a sinlge
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and turns it wide of midwicket for a single
went for the pull, ended up playing it uppishly, sailed towards fine leg but landed short of him
pitched up outside off, drives it down the ground past the bowler for a single
short of a good length on middle, turns it towards short fine leg, no single there, was uppish for a bit
short of a length outside off, punched towards deep point for a single
nicely pulled by Irfan, Pradeep dives over that one at fine leg, dropped it short did Malinga and Pathan pulled it along the ground behind square leg, connected well
pulled away but Pradeep doesn't have to move much this time, a single is what he gets
short of a good length on the off, punched it to extra cover
Irfan attacks, made room to that good length ball and smacked him over cover, but there is a fielder in the deep, gets to him on the bounce
shortish on the off, turned away through midwicket for a single
superbly done by Pathan, another short ball and he dispatches it hard through square leg, Malinga runs to his right and dives but he had no chance there
yorker outside off, tries to dig it out into the off side, misses
follows that up with a slower one this time, keeps a little low, came from the back of the hand, Pathan didn't make contact
slower one bowled short on the off, pulls it through square leg for a single
good yorker from Malinga, in the blockhole outside off, dug out by Pathan
pitched up on the off, drives that one down to long-on for a single
fine leg is inside the circle and that has been misdirected, short of a good length on middle and leg and that's been turned past short fine for a boundary, 250 up for India, can they reach 300?
pitched up outside off, drives that in front of deep extra cover for a single
slower one bowled on a length outside off, gets a thick outside edge towards third man for a single
low full toss on the off, Dhoni drives it to long-off for a single
shortish outside off, punched towards deep cover for a single
shortish on the off, punched towards long-off for a single
Thrashed by Dhoni, short and wide and that's been blazed over point for a one bounce four, gave it a thwack
lovely from Dhoni, cheekily done, short of a good length on middle and he whipped it away stylishly past short fine leg
Three in a row, third man is up and he picks up a boundary with ease, slower one bowled short outside off and it's cut past short third man
another slower one bowled short outside off and he chops that one to point
yorker length delivery outside off, Pathan tried to dig it out past point, misses
full toss and it's crunched towards long-off for a single
full toss on middle and it's punched down the ground to long-on
cracked on the up through towards deep point for a single
nicely struck, low full toss and that was driven hard through extra cover, Kapugedera runs across, dives and palms it back in, Dhoni's still limping
full outside off, played away to deep point for a single
full toss outside off, whipped through midwicket for a single
chipped past extra cover for a sinlge
pushed that through extra cover for one more, wanted the second, didn't get it
well struck but gets to deep midwicket on the bounce, landed full and swung it hard
pitched on a length and Dhoni gets under it to reach his half-century in style, swung away hard over deep midwicket for a big one, cleared the ropes easily, landed on the grassbanks
full and wide and he wanted to send that over square leg, big swing, missed
slower one from Malinga, tries to swing it square, gets an inside edge onto the pads, Dhoni rushes through this time for a single
dropped that one short on the off, pulled past square leg into the deep for a single
a yorker on the off, dug out wide of Malinga, he can't field it on his follow through, a single taken
lucky, low full toss outside off, tries to blast it through the leg side, gets an inside edge to beat short fine leg to the boundary
Wicket no. 200 for Malinga in ODIs, short outside off, Dhoni went for the pull, got a nick and Chandimal took it in front of his face
and he'll keep strike for the final over, taps that into the off side behind point for a single
Ashwin gets across to whip it square, struck high on the pads, gets a run
a well bowled yorker, in the blockhole on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
on a length, struck meatily but on the bounce to long-on
short of a good length outside off, moves away and fails to make contact
hit and miss again, on a good length this time and tries to carve that over extra cover, missed
pulled away, short outside off, they only get the single as he gets it wide of long-on, Ashwin slipped while turning for the second

inn2.comm: leaving the left-hander, lands on a good length and then nips away, leaves that one alone
down the leg side from Zaheer this time and Dhoni dives to his right, gets a glove to it, three runs in all
another one down the leg side, another wide, false start from Zaheer
appeal for lbw, ooh, angled in towards middle and leg, got across to play it into the leg side, struck a little high on the pads, that would have been the doubt, also it could have just gone down leg
nicely struck from Tharanga, landed on a good length, he leaned forward and drove it through extra cover for a boundary
angling in towards middle, gets forward and defends it in front of the bowler
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and defends it into the off side
gets some inswing, Dilshan gets across and plays it to square leg, landed on a good length
too wide, on a good length, way too wide and it's called by the umpire
appeal for lbw, swung in again from Pathan, landed on middle and leg, tried to flick it square and was rapped on the pads, would have missed leg stump

well taken by Zaheer at third man, bowled on a good length but that was really wide, Dilshan went after that one and sliced it straight towards Zaheer, he had to run forward and took it well, reaching forward and collecting it inches from the ground
short of a good length on middle, gets front and across and defends it to point
bowled that in the channel outside off, moves away and that's been left alone to the keeper
pitched on a length and it's been driven solidly through extra cover, sweetly struck, three more runs
good length on the off, gets a thick outside edge to third man as it nips away a little
turns that one into the leg side off the front foot
a wide again, this one slides down the leg side and it's called by the umpire
pitched up outside off and it's been dispatched, plenty of room for Tharanga and it's smashed over extra cover for a boundary
a bit of away movement, landed on a good length and moved away from off, tried to push it through the line, got a thick edge towards third man for a single
on the pads and it's been pushed through midwicket into the deep for a couple of runs
short of a good length outside off, moves away, stabs at that one and is beaten
shortish on leg stump, turns that wide of midwicket for a single
in the channel outside off stump, getting some away swing, leaves that one alone
good length outside off, gets front and across and pushes it towards point
on a good length, tries to drop it into the off side, gets an inside edge and they set off for a quick single
thick outside edge, the swing and movement working well for Irfan, tries to drive it down the ground, ends up flying down to third man
slides that one down the leg side and it's called a wide
dropped it short outside off and he got out of the way of that one
whipped away uppishly but safe, short of a good length and he turns his wrists to play it over Rahane at midwicket
gets a thick inside edge down to fine leg, angling in on middle and leg, pitched on a good length, tried to play it straight
a single wide of midwicket, shortish on middle, punched off the back foot and Rahane, diving to his right, keeps them to a single
bowled on a good length outside off, nips away and it just goes past the outside edge
fishing for one outside off, in the channel once again, gets it to move away to go past the outside edge
short of a length on the off, punched from the crease towards point
pitched on a length on the off, that's driven soundly down the ground past the bowler and mid-on for three runs
goodish length on middle, made a bit of room and pushed it back to the bowler
edged and flies past second slip, short of a good length, moving away, goes for the cut, Tharanga takes a bit of a risk and slashes hard, second slip had no chance
angling in, gets across and turns it through square leg for a single
that's been absolutely creamed, width from Irfan, on a good length and he reaches for it to smash it through point, square-driven and done so wonderfully
four more, short of a good length, goes on the back foot this time and crunches it past the diving point, his bottom-hand came off when he hit that but he'd struck it well
nips back in, lands short of a good length on middle and moves in, tries to whip it off the back foot, struck high on the pads
Meanwhile, Sri Lanka are going along smoothly, short of a good length and it's punched well through extra cover, nicely timed and it's four more
gets forward and plays it towards point
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and punches it to mid-off
keeps a little low as he tried to push it back, gets to Dhoni on the second bounce
short of a good length on middle, rocks back and punches it to the bowler
short of a good length, tried to whip it square, got an inside edge onto the pads and they get a single
short of a good length, rocks on the back foot and punches it to extra cover
superbly driven, through the line, pitched on a length on middle and he caresses it down the ground past the diving mid-on
shortish outside off, tries to cut, misses and Dhoni fumbles to concede a single
ohh Tharanga goes, he was looking really good, Irfan strikes again, pitched up outside off and he drives it loosely and straight to extra cover, easy catch
goodish length and it's been pushed straight to extra cover
shortish on middle and leg, punched from the crease through midwicket for a single
short of a good length outside off, punched towards mid-off from the crease
shortish on the off, punched more firmly off the back foot this time to mid-off
shortish on the off, crunched off the back foot towards cover from the crease
short and he went at that one really hard, thick outside edge over the slips for a boundary, was probably aiming at point but the bounce helped it carry it over the slips
excellent timing, just a punch, Zaheer could have put in a better effort at mid-on there, punched from the crease, bounces above the bowler and beats mid-on and mid-off, a dive would have helped
lands on a good length on the off, rocks forward and defends it into the leg side
shortish on the off, pushes it wide of mid-off for a single
slides it on the pads, tries to whip it fine, strikes him on the pads, they pick a leg-bye and overthrows are averted by mid-off
shortish outside off, cuts it down towards point and Tiwary fields well moving to his right
away movement for Irfan, landed on a good length and moved away, left that one alone
pitched up outside off, drives it wide of Zaheer at mid-off, he gives chase and cuts it off, two more though

Chandimal's gone! Short of a good length on middle and leg, he moved across to whip it square, missed, no inside edge, appeared to be going on to hit leg. The umpire thought so and gave it out. The things to look out for are the height and whether it was missing leg.
drops that one short on middle, Mathews is taken by surprise there, took his eyes off that one but got some bat on it
dropped that one short outside off, pulls it uppishly past square leg for a single
short of a good length outside off, tries to punch it through cover, gets a thick outside edge towards third one
short of a good length on the off, defends it off the back foot into the off side
Zaheer bowls that one short outside off, punches it straight to extra cover
bowled in the channel outside off from round the wicket, fishes for it as it moves away, misses
in the channel outside off, this time he leaves it alone
pushed it short outside off and it's punched towards extra cover
bowled in the channel again and this time he got it to move back in, Mathews left it alone, wasn't far from the off stump
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot towards cover
goodish length on the off, gets on the back foot and plays it towards point
nicely timed and he finds the boundary, short of a good length and it's punched through extra cover, came off the meat
edged and well fielded by Zaheer at third man, pushed inside the line to that, got an edge wide of slip and Zaheer ran a fair distance to his left and collected it with one hand
short of a good length, crunches it towards point from the crease
drops that one short outside off, goes for the pull and finds the gap again, pulls it well through midwicket for a boundary
shortish on middle, pushed it wide of midwicket for a single
short of a good length outside off, pushed towards cover

run-out, sharp fielding at point, Mathews pushed that towards point, wanted the single but was sent back a little belatedly, Tiwary picked up and threw down the stumps at the striker's end, was moving to his right and was accurate with the throw, Mathews, despite a big stretch, was caught short. Sri Lanka lose another one
pushed on a good length on the off, drives it towards long-off for a single
shortish outside off, pushed off the back foot past point
short outside off, dragged towards long-on for a single
bowled it on a good length, defended it wide of cover off the front foot
tossed up outside off and that's been driven wide of extra cover for a couple of runs
gave it more air this time and Kapugedera responded more confidently, crashed it past the diving extra cover for a boundary
shortish outside off and this one held its line, didn't turn and he was beaten
short and it's been pulled hard towards deep midwicket, on the bounce, for a single
gets forward and defends that back towards the bowler
shortish outside off, chops that wide of point, Irfan fields diving to his left, 100 up
down the leg side, the umpire calls it a wide, there appeared to be a deflection off the pads there, he didn't see it

Kapugedera knew he was gone! Angled in towards middle, Kapugedera gets across and misses as he tries to defend, struck in line with middle and leg and the umpire, as most others, had doubt. Kapugedera misses another chance
short of a good length outside off, leaves that one alone to the keeper
tempting, driving length outside off, moves away after pitching, left alone to the keeper
goodish length on the off, gets on the back foot and plays it back down the pitch
struck on the pads as he moves across, but struck too high, on the thigh actually
nips back in from outside off and he wants to leave that alone, struck on the pads, not offering a shot there, but did that move in enough to take out the stumps? The umpire doesn't think so
that's beautifully struck but hit straight to extra cover, well fielded there, was hit hard
shortish outside off, chops that wide of point for a single
gets forward and a little outside the line to defend that back towards the bowler
chipped uppishly but safe, got across and played it through midwicket for a single
shortish outside off, cuts that into the ground and towards point
thrashed, poor ball, short and wide and that's been dispatched wide of a diving point for a boundary
dropped that short on the off, pulled past square leg into the deep for a single
in the channel outside off, moves away and he lets that one go
short outside off, crunched through point off the back foot into the deep
on a good length, gets back and knocks it down into the leg side for a single
pushed it full on the off, gets forward and across and drives it back to the bowler

appeal for lbw, gets across to play it into the on-side, missed, was struck on the pads, was a long way across there, not sure if it would have missed leg. The appeal wasn't a strong one, they get a run, so there was some bat
tossed up, gets forward and plays it into the leg side
gets across and plays it through midwicket for a single
gets forward and defends it to the left of the bowler, no single there
flighted outside off, that's driven straight towards cover
floating it on leg stump, turns it past square leg for a single
pushing it full on middle and that's been played back to the bowler
lands on leg stump, turns it through square leg for a single
bowled on a good length outside off and that's been left alone
poor ball, on leg stump, he moves across to clip it down towards the fine-leg boundary
nips back in from a good length, gets back and defends it towards midwicket
comes back in a hint, gets across to flick it through square leg for a single
crunched through to deep point for a single to keep strike, 22 off that Powerplay
flighted on middle, drives that one down towards long-on for a single
fired it quick on middle and off, gets across and stabs it into the leg side
fetches it from middle and off and sweeps it down fine for a couple of runs, Ashwin thought it hit the pads which it didn't
gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
gave it some air, drives that one back to the bowler
quicker delivery, crunched through to deep extra cover for a single
slightly short on middle, gets across and plays it to midwicket
rocks forward and pushes it back to the bowler
floating it on middle, turned away towards midwicket
on a good length on the off, gets across and defends it to midwicket
shortish outside off, punched towards long-off for a single
shortish outside off and he cut that well but Tiwary did well, diving to his right to save a few runs
flighted on the off, gets forward and drives it to long-off for a single
angling in towards middle, that's been stabbed towards extra cover
on a good length, tries to push it through the off side, ends up playing it back to the bowler
pushes that one straight back to the bowler
gets forward and tickles that one towards midwicket
shortish outside off and that's been chopped towards point
gets forward and tries to tickle it fine, misses, comes off the pads for a couple of runs
gets forward and turns it towards midwicket
straight on middle, forward and across and pushes it to midwicket again
angling in towards middle, played that wide of square leg for a single
flighted on leg stump, turns it away behind square for one more
shortish on middle, gets forward and drops it into the leg side
stifled appeal for lbw, pushed that one through quicker, struck on the pads but would have gone down leg
pushes it towards midwicket from the crease
shortish outside off, punched towards deep cover from the crease
driven soundly down the ground towards long-off for a single
another appeal for lbw but this too would have missed leg I think, tried to play it straight, missed
turned away to just go past the outside edge, poked at it and was beaten by the spin
shortish on middle, punches it towards long-on for a single
shortish again and that's been crunched down to long-on for one more
a bit of air on that one, comes down the track and drives it to long-on
gets front and across and pushes it towards square leg
quicker through the air from round the wicket, plays it back to the bowler
gets across and clips it through square leg for a single
some turn there, angling in from round the stumps towards leg and then turns away, gets a leading edge in front of extra cover
comes down the track and drives it back to the bowler
was thinking of trying to paddle that, held it back did Ashwin, turned away and he missed as he changed his mind to guide it to point
pushes it straight and Thirimanne drives him to long-on for a single
gets back and turns it behind square for a single
tossed up on the off and it's driven back to Ashwin
shortish outside off from Rohit and that's crunched past extra cover into the deep for a couple of runs
gets forward and sweeps that fine for a single
paddles that one towards fine leg for a single
slowed it up this time, cracked it towards extra cover
shortish outside off, moves back to punch it straight to extra cover
gets forward, turns the face and plays it wide of midwicket for a single
sweeps that one wide of fine leg for a single, thought about the second but it wasn't there
comes down the track and drives that wide of long-off for a single
quicker delivery on middle, turns that wide of midwicket for one more
tries to paddle that from outside off, gets a bottom edge
pushed it full on middle, tries to chip it into the leg side, gets an inside edge on the pad
flighted outside off, drives it down to long-off for a single
pushed it on a good length on the off, whips it straight to midwicket
comes down the track and works it behind square for a single to raise the 50-stand
pitched on a length and that's played straight to extra cover
shortish outside off, punched off the back foot to long-off
comes down the track and pushes that flighted delivery back to the bowler
some urgency from Thirimanne, takes it from outside off and swings it hard over midwicket, shortish and he connected well, first boundary in quite some time
reverse swept and for a four! Consecutive boundaries for Sri Lanka, it was floated up in the air and crashed through what was the third-man region...
slower again and defended on the front foot
pitched up, on the middle stump and he attempts another reverse sweep, straight to the fielder
nudged away to the leg side and takes a single
shorter this time from Raina and cut away to the covers for a single, fifty for the batsman, second against India
played away to the leg side for a single, good over for Sri Lanka
pitched on the off stump, slower and spins slightly away, beats the batsman
shorter and punched to long-off for a single
quicker one, drifting on to the leg stump, clipped away to the deep square-leg region for a single
slower, on the middle stump, the batsman goes down to the pitch of the ball and drives to long-off for a run
shorter again, cut away to the deep cover for a single
reverse sweep attempted, does not come off this time, hit some part of the body or equipment and lobbed up but Dhoni could not get there in time anyway, just in front of the batsman
inside out and chipped over the covers, they come back for the second run
cut away through the point region, it was misfielded by Tiwary that allows them the single
pitched up and driven back to the bowler, fielded this time
two shots in one, was attempting the reverse sweep, saw the bowler pitch it very short and changed it to cut it, but to the fielder
cuts away well this time, to the left of the deep cover fielder for a couple of runs
slower on the middle stump and defended back to the bowler, no run this time
pitched on the off stump, not too much turn and defended on the off side

down the track and that has been dispatched over the mid-wicket region for a six! Comes at the run time for the Lankans, they need some runs off the part-timers, was pitched up and he went for the lofted shot
shorter this time, expectedly, and punched to long-on for a single
pitched right up to the bat, carefully pushed back to the bowler
bad, bad ball, was probably trying the googly, or probably not, but it was miles down the leg side and missed hitting it properly gets some bat on it

down the track and over mid-wicket yet again, and guess what, it is the same result, six more runs for the batsman, experiment to bring back India's best bowler from the previous game hasn't worked this time!
short of length, on the middle and flicked away to the square-leg for a single
on the off stump, pitched fuller to the bat and driven to the covers, where Raina dives to his right and prevents that single
length ball outside the off stump, driven to the deep point region for a single
outside the off stump, 121.8 km/hr, tries to cut hard at that but hits the toe end of the bat and goes straight to the fielder at point
outside the off-stump, not quick again, length ball, punched to long-on for a single
short outside the off stump and cut away to the deep point region, there was a bit of a misfield but the fielder quickly recovered and prevents the second.
Sri Lanka begin the batting Powerplay with a boundary, down the leg side and he gets a touch to it, off the thighs and past Dhoni
Thirmanne has smashed Zaheer out of the ground, dropped short and he pulled him imperiously over the deep midwicket boundary, 200 up
a slower one gone bad, too wide and it's left alone
dropped, short outside off and Thirimanne tried to glide that to third man, got a thick edge and Dhoni, diving to his left, dropped it. Was catchable and he should have caught it
short of a good length, guides that one to third man for a single

Oh dear, Thirimanne has to go, pulled it towards Kohli at mid-on, Thirimanne is ball watching as he runs while Jeevan Mendis has his back turned towards his partner, Thirimanne is more than halfway down the pitch as Kohli returns a throw to Zaheer, who throws it to Dhoni, who runs forward and takes down the stumps as Thirimanne dives full length, trying to get back. It's in vain and India have struck a crucial blow. Dhoni hurt himself while charging forward to that ball
beaten, short of a good length and moves away, he pokes at it and it goes past outside edge
bowls that short outside off, slapped wide of mid-off for a single
angling in towards leg stump, turns it into the leg side from the crease
works it away from the crease towards square leg again
firing it quick on middle, turned away to that fielder once again
drops this one in front of square leg to pick a quick single
quicker through the air from round the wicket, played back to the bowler
wow, a leading edge goes for four, short of a good length, tried to whack it over square leg, got a leading edge and it went over point for a one bounce four
shortish on middle, turns it wide of mid-on for a single
angling in towards middle and leg, turned away past square leg for a single
shortish on middle, pushed towards mid-on from the crease
short and Mendis cashes in, jabs that through midwicket, firmly hit and the man in the deep has to a long distance to cover, can't reach it
short and wide, cuts it away towards deep point for a single to keep strike
bowled it full on middle, turns it in front of midwicket for a single
slightly short, pushed into the leg side, Dhoni runs forward, collects and tries to throw down the stumps at the striker's end, misses
powerfully swept by Thisara, fetches it from the off stump and sweeps it hard over short fine leg for a one bounce four
tossed up on leg stump, flicked away through midwicket for a single
shortish outside off, brings up his half-century with a punch through extra cover, there's no one there and he picks up a boundary
tapped it into the off side for a single
on a good length, mistimes a shot back to the bowler, outstretched arms as he tries to catch it on the bounce, ends up knocking back the stumps at the non-strikers end
Excellent fielding by Rahul Sharma, the substitute fielder, at deep extra cover, short and wide and it's crashed in that region, slides to his left and drags it back in
shortish outside off and its thwacked it towards mid-on, Zaheer does well to get his body behind it
low full toss on middle and it's been driven to midwicket where Kohli fields and threatens to throw down the stumps at the striker's end
bowled on a good length, it's been driven back to the bowler
edged and short of third man, short of a good length, tries to cane that through extra cover
down the leg side, not for the first time, Dhoni fumbles as well, two runs
short of a good length outside off, mistimes a drive towards cover
shortish on the off, pushed wide of point for a single
shortish outside off, cut towards deep point for one more run
bowled on a length outside off, crashed through to long-on for a single
shortish on leg stump, turned away through square leg into the deep for a couple of runs
pitched on a length, drives it down to long-on for a single
short and wide, crashed through to deep cover for a single
cracks that on the bounce towards long-off for a single
aiming for a yorker, that's been pushed down to long-on for a single
short of a length on the off, pushed in front of extra cover for a single
superb from Mendis, no time to react at midwicket, short of a length and he seizes the length early to blaze that through midwicket for a boundary
on a good length, gets across and lays it back to the bowler
short of a good length, cracked towards deep cover for a single
goodish length, pushed towards mid-off for a quick single, well in despite a direct-hit
Perera has holed out but Mendis is still there, pitched up outside off and he went after it, sliced it straight to Virat Kohli at deep point,  easily held and Irfan strikes again
short of a length, slashes hard but doesn't make contact, misses
edged and four, the runs keep coming, Irfan isn't happy, there's no slip, short of a good length and he nicks it to the third-man boundary
Mendis has to go now! Short and he goes for the cut, gets a nick straight to Dhoni, Irfan takes four. There to cut and he went for it
pitched on a length, driven towards mid-off
nipped away, there was a deviation, but it wasn't bat, fished for it and missed
angling in towards middle, defended into the leg side for a single
angling in towards middle, that's played through midwicket, Rahul Sharma runs in and returns a throw to the non-striker's end, they've completed two runs by then
shortish outside off, stabs that wide of point for a single
on a good length on the off, defends from the crease into the off side
shortish outside off, chops that wide of point for a couple into the deep
pitched up and it's driven straight to mid-off
short on the off, pulls it behind square leg for a single
beaten, in the channel outside off and he was flirting with it, missed
pitched up on the off, pushes it towards mid-off for a quick single
drops that one short but it's too high and he's left that one alone, called a wide
Five-for for Irfan, gets a wicket off the final ball of his spell, goes round the wicket, landed on a good length and Senanayake swings hard, misses and his off stump is knocked back
Malinga ain't giving up and this ain't over yet, pitched up outside off, lofts that over extra cover for a boundary

Four more, remember that four that Lance Klusener hit off Damien Fleming in that World Cup semi-final in the final over, just wide of long-off. This is a right handed version of that. Pitched up and that's drilled wide of the long-off fielder whose dive is in vain
low full toss outside off, mistimes a drive, gets it to long-on, refuses the single

excellent catch from Raina who was running back from long-off, low full toss and Malinga struck it well but not well enough, Raina ran back and took it calmly just in front of the ropes to seal victory
